alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 1:34PM AKST until March 06 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation 4 to 8 inches, with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...Until 1 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slippery roads and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of moderate to heavy snow has developed from Big Lake to Wasilla. Periods of moderate to heavy snow will continue through the afternoon and evening hours. The heaviest bands of snow are expected to shift east over Palmer, Butte, and Sutton by Saturday evening. The snow is then expected to taper off by early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
